review.title: “Lousy Bonuses, Unfair Treatment”
review.pros: Pros – The hours are not so bad if you are on the phones, and there is a chance to get some good bonuses.
review.cons: Cons – The base pay is very low, most of the sales and telesales people are teenagers, you will not be treated as an individual, but as a robot.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Respect the people that work so hard to put money in your pocket, make it worth while to come to work.
